assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Arabi Group Holding Company K.S.C. (Public) operates in the oil and gas, retails, investments, and construction sectors in Kuwait and internationally. It provides primary and secondary healthcare services through hospitals and primary healthcare centers. The company also offers water equipment, such as water pumps, filters, and heaters, as well as valves garage equipment, and pipes/fittings; power tools, landscape and irrigation systems, misting systems, window cleaning machines, space frames, and on line leak sealing services; garage and industrial equipment, including specialized building equipment, firefighting and HVAC pumps, air condition equipment, and constriction chemicals materials; and cleaning and oil and gas equipment, power tools and safety equipment, welding accessories, water and waste water treatment equipment, access equipment, personal safety, welding equipment, etc. In addition, it undertakes EPC, construction, and maintenance contracts; landscaping and irrigation works; and construction and maintenance contracts in the heating, ventilation, and air-conditioning specialty. Further, the company provides card solutions for exchange houses, banks, malls, retail outlets, restaurants and hotels, and other point-based privilege schemes; SMS systems for financial institutions, insurance companies, hospitals, telecommunication companies, postal and courier services, etc.; solutions for point-of-sale technology; remittance and money transfers ready, and custom-made solutions; and other IT solutions and services. Additionally, it offers outsourcing services, such as customer interactions, customer relationship management, sales/telemarketing campaign, technical IT support, call center/helpdesk setup; various solutions to the healthcare and scientific technology sectors; and financial advisory services to businesses and high-net-worth individuals. Arabi Group Holding Company K.S.C. (Public) was founded in 1963 and is based in Kuwait City, Kuwait.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Salah Mohammed Saqer Al Maousherji
companyOfficers.title: Exec. Director
